message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product, which I believe holds significant value for your business.  My initial price is $1,000,000.  I'm confident we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I see in the product.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I understand your perspective, $900,000 doesn't quite reflect the full value of this product.  I'm willing to come down to $950,000, but this is my final offer.  Let's finalize this deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $950,000 is still a bit above my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $925,000. I believe this is a fair price for both of us.
